SEARCH
Package com.straxov.loader

Class ConfigLoader

java.lang.Object
com.straxov.loader.ConfigLoader
public class ConfigLoader extends Object
Singleton configuration loader that reads simulation parameters from properties files. Provides thread-safe access to all configuration parameters.
